灊字的基本解释

灊
qián
古河名，即潜水，在今中国四川省。
古地名，在今中国安徽省霍山县。

灊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》昨鹽切，平鹽，從。］
［《廣韻》昨淫切，平侵，從。］
［《廣韻》徐林切，平侵，邪。］
(1)古水名。在四川省境，即今之渠江。
(2)古县名。春秋时楚潜邑。汉置灊县，属庐江郡。南朝梁于此置霍州，隋废州，改置霍山县。今属安徽省。
(3)山名。即天柱山。在安徽省潜山县西北。

灊字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灊； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页662第26
【唐韻】昨鹽切【集韻】【韻會】慈鹽切，?音潛。水名。【說文】水出巴郡宕渠，西南入江。　又縣名。【史記·吳世家】以兵圍楚之六灊。【註】灊在廬江六縣西南。　又【廣韻】徐林切【集韻】徐心切，?音尋。又【廣韻】才林切【集韻】才淫切，?音鬵。又【廣韻】昨淫切【集韻】鋤簪切，?音岑。義?同。○按《說文》从水鬵聲。鬵，上从兂。《正字通》誤从旡，非。今改正。

灊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
灊字的起名意思

暂无。

kneel
Basic explanation of words
kneel
qián
The name of the ancient river, namely diving, is in present-day Sichuan Province, China.
Ancient place names, in Huoshan County, Anhui Province, China.
kneel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" salt cut yesterday, flat salt, from. ]
["Guangyun" yesterday lewdly, flatly invaded, from. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Linqie, flat invasion, evil. ]
(1) Ancient water name. In Sichuan Province, it is now the Qujiang River.
(2) The name of the ancient county. Chu Qianyi in the Spring and Autumn Period. The Han Dynasty was home to Qianxian County, which belonged to Lujiang County. The Southern Dynasties Liang set Huozhou here, the Sui Dynasty abandoned the state, and changed to Huoshan County. It belongs to Anhui Province.
(3) The name of the mountain. Namely Tianzhu Mountain. In the northwest of Qianshan County, Anhui Province.
kneel
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　灊; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 662 26
[Tang Yun] Salt cut yesterday [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Kind salt cut, sound potential. Water name. [Said the text] The water flows out of the Dangqu in Ba County and enters the river in the southwest.　Also the county name. 【Historical Records·Wu Family】Encircle the six evils of Chu with soldiers. [Note] It is in the southwest of the six counties of Lujiang.　[Guangyun] Xu Linqie [Jiyun] Xu Xinqie, search for sound. [Guang Yun] Cai Lin Qi [Ji Yun] is only lewd and cut,? Yin 鬵. Also [Guang Yun] lewdly cut yesterday [Ji Yun] cut hairpins,? Yin Cen. Righteous? Same. ○Press "Suowen" from the sound of water.鬵，上从兂。 "Zhengzitong" is mistaken from Ni, Fei. Correct now.

Name meaning
Nothing.
qián
собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 灊水) Цяньшуй (река в пров. Шэньси)
2) ист. Цянь (владение царства Чу на территории нынешней пров. Аньхой; эпоха Чуньцю)
3) ист., геогр. (сокр. вм. 灊县) Цяньсянь (уезд на территории нынешней пров. Аньхой; эпоха Хань)
